level.heading: First Source Agreement required.
level.text: HQ Hotel, L.L.C., shall enter into a First Source Agreement with the District that shall govern certain obligations of HQ Hotel, L.L.C., pursuant to § 2-219.03 and Mayor's Order 83-265 (November 9, 1983), regarding job creation and employment generated as a result of the construction of the new convention center hotel.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-171 redesignated D.C. Law 10-188, § 902 as D.C. Law 10-188, § 242.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2(i) of New Convention Center Hotel Emergency Amendment Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-186, August 12, 2009, 56 DCR 6967).
